name: YWOT Dark
description: Changes Your World Of Text to a darker one.
additional_info: Feel free to discuss this style below or at the YWOT page! I originally wanted to include a custom font, but unfortunately there doesn't seem to be a way to get Google Fonts to work with Stylish for Firefox (if you want to publish a style, you have to do that in the Firefox format). However, if you're using Chrome, you can still get the "full" version here.
